snippet: GlaxoSmithKline of Britain is in talks to buy Human Genome Sciences on friendly terms, potentially ending a hostile bid for the maker of a promising treatment for lupus, a person briefed on the matter said Sunday.
abstract: GlaxoSmithKline of Britain is in talks to buy Human Genome Sciences on friendly terms, potentially ending a hostile bid for the maker of a promising treatment for lupus, a person briefed on the matter said Sunday.
